name: DecideMe
0:
”Alexa ask Decide Me spin a spinner”
”Alexa ask Decide Me help me decide”
”Alexa ask Decide Me spin that spinner”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: decide me
des: DecideMe takes the decision out of your hands and leaves it to up to random number generation. Simply address DecideMe, and it will give you a number to make your choice based off of (1-6). DecideMe can be used for any range of choices that you need to make.
